title: Shop LubeTech
blurb: eCommerce website for LubeTech used by both customers and internal salespeople. Replaced traditional .NET MVC website with more modern Angular SPA front-end and .NET Core API. Significantly faster for the user while being less resource-intensive.

title: LubeTech Multi-Tenant
blurb: Rewrite of LubeTech eCommerce for multiple internal companies, all sharing the same code base. Significant improvements in user inferface, speed, and performance. Hybrid mobile and web implementation.

title: Mighty Sales
blurb: Progressive web application which allows the Mighty salesperson to rapidly enter orders, whether connected to the internet or not.

title: www-timer
blurb: Custom pomodoro timer which allows the user to customize their pomodoro workflow.

title: Bar Cribbage
blurb: Play five simultaneous cribbage hands, one card at a time. Score will be kept automatically.
